title: Faculty Development Program for Improving the Quality of Online Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Mobile-Based Microlearning Design Competency Enhancement for In-Service Secondary Mathematics Teachers

learning_goals: Design and develop at least three types of mobile-friendly mathematics education content.
Apply at least two instructional strategies to promote online interaction.
Create at least five assessment tools for types of mathematical problems applicable to project-based evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
